descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#e69138][size=5]This mod include  my character as follower.
Helen Love is in the main hall of Jorrvaskr.[/size][/color][b][size=5]
She is a powerful Mage Destruction, with various spells and shouts, she is Essencial and you can marry her. Health 999, Stamina 999 and Magicka 999.

[color=#00ffff]added version 7Base[/color]

[color=#cc0000]Manual Install - or install with some manager
==============
1. Extract the files to a temporary location such as the desktop.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\Skyrim.


Manual Uninstall
===============
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Credits : [/color]
